title: After HC rap, Telangana govt withdraws orders on ‚ÄòGame Changer‚Äô ticket price hike - Telangana Today
summary:
After HC Rap, Telangana Govt Withdraws Orders on 'Game Changer' Ticket Price Hike

Published Date: 11 January 2025, 10:04 PM | Source: Telangana Today

The Telangana government has decided to withdraw its orders for a hike in ticket prices and additional morning shows for the movie 'Game Changer' due to public safety concerns following an incident at another film screening.

  • The government will not allow early morning shows until public interest and safety are evaluated.
  • This decision came after the High Court directed the state government to reconsider its previous decision to increase ticket prices and allow extra shows.
  • Initially, permission was granted for an additional show and a ticket price hike of Rs 100 for multiplexes and Rs 50 for standalone theatres.
  • Previous incidents related to ticket pricing and early screenings have raised public concern.
  • The Chief Minister reiterated that the government would not allow further price hikes or benefit shows.
‚ÄúThe orders were issued following the High Court‚Äôs directions to reconsider the hike in ticket prices.‚Äù

This withdrawal reflects the government's commitment to public safety and interests in light of recent incidents.
newTitle: Telangana Government Withdraws Ticket Price Hike for 'Game Changer' Movie

This week brings an exciting array of South Indian films premiering on OTT platforms, offering the perfect opportunity to enjoy fresh releases from the comfort of your home.

  • Bachchala Malli: A Telugu film streaming on ETV Win featuring Allari Naresh.
  • Pani: Premiering on SonyLIV on January 16, 2025, this series follows real estate ambitions and challenges.
  • Break Out: A Telugu film about a filmmaker confronting his fears, available on ETV Win.
  • Neeli Megha Shyama: A romantic drama exploring life-altering experiences, streaming on Aha.
  • Hide N Seek: A gripping Telugu thriller revolving around mysterious suicides now available on Aha.

These films promise a mix of suspense, drama, and entertainment for movie enthusiasts.

title: Allu Arjun Gets BIG Relief In Fan's Death Case, Court Lists Down Relaxations For Pushpa 2 Actor - News18
summary:
Allu Arjun Gets BIG Relief In Fan's Death Case

Date: January 11, 2025 Source: News18

Allu Arjun received significant legal relaxations in connection with the Pushpa 2 stampede case, alleviating some conditions previously imposed on him after his arrest last month.

  • Allu Arjun was arrested in relation to a stampede incident that occurred at the Pushpa 2 premiere, which resulted in a woman's death and injuries to a child.
  • The Nampally court has exempted him from appearing at the Chikkadapally police station every Sunday for security reasons.
  • He has also been granted permission to travel abroad.

"The crowd went out of control after Allu Arjun stepped out of his car to greet fans attending the premiere," stated a source close to the incident.

This legal development comes after Allu Arjun was previously remanded to judicial custody and then granted interim bail.
newTitle: Allu Arjun Gets BIG Relief in Fan's Death Case
